attributes.action: Fix a bridge at https://goo.gl/maps/yMVxWZMF8gU3vinv5 that has potholes
attributes.additional_details: This road is a disaster waiting to happen. I am trying to avoid serious accidents happening on this road
attributes.background: The road is within the borough of Ealing council, I want Ealing council to resurface the road fixing all the potholes

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about local road maintenance are a matter for individual local authorities, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them, by entering your post code here: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
